scripts.reset:dev: NODE_ENV=development docker compose down -v && NODE_ENV=development docker compose up -d --build && docker compose exec backend node populateMinio.js && docker compose exec backend node populateUsers.js
scripts.reset:prod: NODE_ENV=production docker compose down -v && NODE_ENV=production docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.production.yml up -d --build
